import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './ManageEstimate.css'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; const ManageEstimate = () => { const [estimates, setEstimates] = useState([]); const [zones, setZones] = useState([]); const [selectedGroup, setSelectedGroup] = useState(''); const [selectedChain, setSelectedChain] = useState(''); const [selectedBrand, setSelectedBrand] = useState(''); const [selectedZone, setSelectedZone] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/estimate/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setEstimates(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching estimates:', error)); fetch('http://localhost:8080/zones/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setZones(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching zones:', error)); }, []); const handleGroupChange = (e) => setSelectedGroup(e.target.value); const handleChainChange = (e) => setSelectedChain(e.target.value); const handleBrandChange = (e) => setSelectedBrand(e.target.value); const handleZoneChange = (e) => setSelectedZone(e.target.value); return (

Estimate Management

Total Estimate

{estimates.length}

Create Estimate
{estimates.map((estimate, index) => ( ))}
Sr.No Group Chain ID Brand Zone Service Details Total Units Price Per Unit Total Edit Delete
{index + 1} {estimate.chain.group.group_name} {estimate.chain.chain_id} {estimate.brandName} {estimate.zoneName} {estimate.service} {estimate.quantity} {estimate.costPerUnit} {estimate.totalCost}
{/* Create Estimate Panel */}
Create Estimate
{/* Edit Estimate Panel */}
Edit Estimate
); }; export default ManageEstimate;
